 - On its turn, a shocked creature can take either an action or a bonus action, but not both.

automation.text: *Melee Weapon Attack:* +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. *Hit:* 2 (1d4) kinetic damage and, if the target is a creature, the creature is shocked until the end of its next turn.
